speaker: C.O.I.L
text: W-E-L-C-O-M-E I-N-T-R-U-D-E-R-S! M-Y N-A-M-E I-S C-O-I-L! W-H-I-C-H S-T-A-N-D-S F-O-R C-O-G-N-I-T-I-V-E O-M-N-I-D-I-R-E-C-T-I-O-N-A-L I-N-T-E-L-L-I-G-E-N-T L-A-M-I-N-A-T-O-R! E-L-I-M-I-N-A-T-I-O-N M-O-D-E N-O-W L-O-A-D-I-N-G . . .

speaker: Dizzy
text:
Please, we don’t want to fight! We just want to take the train back to the station.
Ashe: I don't think it can be reasoned with.

speaker: Terra
text: You were a LAMINATOR?! Can I PLEASE study your component make-up after we’re done kicking your metallic butt?

speaker: C.O.I.L
text: P-L-E-A-S-E H-O-L-D S-T-I-L-L. T-H-I-S W-I-L-L O-N-L-Y H-U-R-T F-O-R A S-E-C-O-N-D.
